name: Bow & Arrow Deer Hunter Challenge
description:
Test out your bow hunting skills with this cool and addictive endless deer hunter game. Your objective is to hit 20 deer within a one minute timeframe and you're good to go into the next level. See how far you can go as the deer run by faster with each level you master. Compare you bow skills with other bow hunters in GAME CENTER and see if you can be the Bow Master with the highest score. Good luck!

Features include:

• Beautiful, fun graphics
• Smooth physics for nice gameplay
• Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
• Multiple levels to play!

Download right now!
